inn1.comm: full delivery just outside off, KJ comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
oye oye! Hesitation! Full delivery on off stump, Kushal pushes it to mid-on and immediately calls for a single, Dilshan was slow to respond and would have struggled, but the throw was wayward
length delivery outside off, swings away from the batsman, Dilshan leaves it alone
fuller delivery just outside off, Dilshan comes forward and punches it down the ground, past the bowler, past mid-off
good delivery outside off, on a length, it leaves the batsman late. Dilshan leaves it alone
another good delivery outside off, on a length, this time Dilshan comes forward and defends towards cover
full delivery outside off, the batsman goes on the front foot and smacks it straight to mid-off
full delivery on the leg stump, swings in, it is flicked in the air through backward square leg
full and swinging away, Dilshan thumps it to wide  mid-off off the front foot, the fielder does well to cut it off
length delivery, leaves the batsman after pitching, left alone
full and on the middle stump, easily driven through wide mid-on, no point chasing it..
another full delivery outside off this time, the batsman just leans on it and pushes it past the bowler, the ball speeds along the turf and races to the boundary
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman goes for the pull, but this one doesn't get up as high as he expected, goes to the keeper
full and wide outside off, the batsman goes for a drive towards mid-off and doesn't get much timing on it, he calls for a quick single though
good delivery on off stump, seaming away, the batsman comes forward and dabs it to the gap at cover for a quick one
back of length delivery on off stump, comes in a touch, defended from the crease
another tight delivery on off stump, defended towards mid-on off the back foot
length delivery on off stump, the batsman shows his golf-skills by giving it a good clean swing, smashed over long-on boundary..
length delivery on off, the batsman goes for a drive, away from the body and gets beaten by the away movement
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman goes back and whips it away to deep backward square leg for three
length delivery angled away from the batsman, KJ leaves it alone
length delivery on the middle and leg line, he stays in the crease and nudges it past midwicket
oh that is easily done! The fine-leg is up in the circle and Zia bowls short of length on the leg stump, the batsman easily glances it fine
length ball outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it to the right of point for a quick single
length delivery just outside off stump, Dilshan stays in the crease and punches it to mid-off
length delivery on off stump, this time he punches it to mid-on and thinks about a single as the fielder is right at the edge of the circle, but then the ball gets to the fielder quickly
full with a little outswing on off stump, punched to mid-on again
length delivery on the pads, clipped towards deep midwicket with ease
short of length delivery on the leg stump line, KJ plays a controlled pull shot fine on the leg side and beats the fielder at short-fine
back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler
he bowls it on the pads again and all Dilshan has to do is flick it on the leg side, past the left side of short fine fielder, they scamper for three
back of length on off stump, defended solidly back to the bowler
length delivery on the middle stump this time, defended towards midwicket
length delivery outside off, he waits and opens the face of the ball to run it fine on the off side, there was no third-man, the point fielder runs after it
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman goes for a drive but inside edges it towards midwicket
wider now, Dilshan has to really stretch to get to this one, he ends up tamely pushing it to short cover
length delivery swinging down the leg side, it flicks the pads on its way to the keeper. Mushy appeals in hope, not out says the umpire
very lucky there! It was a length delivery outside off and he again goes for the golf-swing, inside edges it past his off stump down to the fine-leg boundary
short of length delivery wide outside off, angles away from him and he chooses the wrong shot, he goes for a pull and is nowhere near the ball
full, very full outside off, this time he goes for a drive, just times it past the fielder at short cover, no stopping that one. Brings up the 50 for the team
this one is a good shot! It was a short of length delivery just outside off, he hops on his toes and gets on top of the bounce, crunches it through cover point
goes on the back foot to a length delivery that comes into him, defends it towards midwicket
floated on a length outside off, defended off the front foot
beats the bat with one that is pushed through outside off, Dilshan goes for a cut, misses
he allows the ball to come to him, then punches it to wide mid-off for a single
quicker delivery on off stump, defended off the back foot
pushed through on off, he comes forward and defends
bowls it with a pause, but it is short and very wide, KJ cuts it straight to point
flatter delivery on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
full delivery on the leg stump, Dilshan paddles it to the right of short-fine and calls for a quick run
oh no! Weird fielding effort by Shahadat at mid-off, it was punched straight to him and it goes straight through him...
goes on the back foot and punches the flat delivery towards mid-on
full and flighted on off, punched firmly back to the bowler
full and tossed up on off, pushed to cover off the front foot
pushed through on off stump, the batsman punches it to long-on off the back foot
flatter delivery on off stump, it is punched to long-off this time
full and flighted, the batsman comes forward and drives it down to long-on
oh he almost got beaten by the flight there! He comes out of the crease, but is not to the pitch of the delivery, defends awkwardly
pushed the flatter delivery towards point
slower, and some turn outside off, defended towards point
very slow and tossed up on the middle stump, it hits the inside edge as Dilshan comes forward to defend
little width and Dilshan cuts it hard, Nasir makes a good diving stop at point
comes down the pitch but gets beaten by the flight, defends
quicker, flatter on off stump, he goes back and punches it down to long-on
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman easily drives it to long-off for a single
spins in from wide outside off, the batsman goes back and cuts it fine on the off side for a couple
bowls flat and short on off stump, the batsman punches it down to long-on
goes back to a shorter delivery and punches it to deep cover
flatter and short on the pads, it's pulled hard to deep midwicket, but there is protection there
comes down the pitch but defends it to off
pushed through on the middle stump, he stays in the crease and punches it down to long-on
quicker delivery outside off, Dilshan waits on the back foot and cuts it to deep backward point
quicker delivery down the leg side, the batsman goes for a sweep, but misses
on the stumps, it is punched to cover off the back foot
tossed up on the stumps, slower, defended off the front foot
waits on the back foot and pushes it to the left of cover fielder for a quick single
waits on the back foot and allows the ball to turn into him, works it to deep midwicket
quicker delivery on the pads, the batsman goes for a drives and gets hit on the pads
slow and flighted on the stumps, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket and calls for a quick single
flatter delivery wide outside off, easily crunched to deep point off the back foot
goes on the back foot to a tossed up delivery outside off, pushes it to cover
quicker on honing on to the stumps, he opens the face to run it to point
drifts on to the leg stump line, the batsman gets hit on the pads and they call for a leg-bye
flatter delivery, turns into the batsman who nudges it towards square leg off the back foot
flatter and quicker on off stump, punched down to long-on for a single
back of length just outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it down to long-off
length delivery on off stump, punched back to the bowler
short of length delivery just outside off, he cuts it to deep point
length delivery on off stump, he comes forward and defends it
another length delivery on off, this time it is punched to long-off
length delivery on off stump, punched down to long-on for a single
flat and short on off stump, he waits on the back foot and runs it to deep backward point
wider this time, cut again to deep backward point
low full-toss on the stumps, driven down to long-on
waits of the turn and works it away to deep square leg
quicker delivery on off stump, he goes back and punches it to wide long-off
and again goes on the back foot, allows the ball to turn and then whips it to deep square leg
length ball on off, 124 kph, easily pushed to long-off off the front foot
slower delivery on the stumps, it is pushed to midwicket from the crease
another slower delivery, this time outside off, the batsman waits and punches it to long-off
length ball on the stumps, pushed with soft hands towards mid-on, they scamper for a single
and another slower ball outside off, punched to long-off for another single
length delivery on off, the batsman turns it straight to midwicket
tossed up delivery, the batsman skips down the pitch and drives it to long-off
pushed through on off stump, the batsman dabs it the off side and takes an easily single
quicker delivery just outside off, he comes forward and punches it to deep cover
tossed up delivery on off stump, punched down the ground to long-on
quicker delivery on the stumps, defended to the leg side
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and drops it towards cover, calls for a quick single and completes his maiden half-century
bowls length on the pads, KJ flicks it to deep backward square leg for a single
now Dilshan gets to his half-century with a punch to deep extra cover
he stays in the crease and punches the length delivery down to long-off
length delivery outside off, Dilshan comes forward and punches it to long-off
waits in the crease for this length ball outside off, opens the face but finds the man at backward point with it
length delivery on the pads, it is tucked to short fine leg
pushed through outside off, the batsman gets beaten as he goes back to cut that
another one flatter outside off, it is guided towards short third man and they steal a single
slower, shorter outside off, he cuts it behind point but still can't find the boundary
plays a premeditated sweep shot, but the ball hits the pads as the bowler fires it in
quicker one on the stumps, he punches it down to long-on for a single
he goes on the back foot and defends the quicker delivery back to the bowler
short of length just outside off, KJ hops on his toes and pushes it to cover
oh nicely timed! It was a slower delivery on the stumps, he just stands tall and punches it past the bowler
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
length delivery outside off, he comes forward and punches it to cover
slower delivery, but it's short and Dilshan swivels and clubs it to deep backward square leg boundary, ends the drought
back of length delivery on the stumps, he tucks it to deep backward square off the back foot for a couple

caught at point! First blow by Bangladesh! It was a short delivery outside off and KJ went for a cut, but the ball bounced a touch extra on him and he got a thick outside edge that was going over point, but Nasir times his jump to perfect and plucks it out..
pushed through wide outside off, Sanga just leans on to it and drives it to deep extra cover
slower, tossed up delivery on off, defended back to the bowler
fired on the leg stump, he tucks it to short fine and calls for a quick single, easily done
flatter delivery on the leg stump line, easily nudged away to deep backward square leg
flighted delivery on the stumps, defended off the front foot
length delivery on off stump, it is eased to deep extra cover off the front foot
fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it back to the bowler, who boots it towards mid-off
length delivery on off, comes in a touch and Sanga gets an inside edge on to his pads as he comes forward in defence
length delivery wide outside off, he comes forward and drives it to extra cover
length delivery on the middle stump line, whipped off the front foot, straight to midwicket
another one on the pads, it is clipped to deep midwicket and Dilshan keeps the strike
quicker one on the stumps, the batsman goes back and pushes it back to the bowler
bowls a long-hop, but Dilshan is late on it, he ends up dragging it to deep backward square leg
slower and flighted outside off, Sanga comes forward and defends
bowls this one with a pause, Sanga easily eases it to long-off for a single
he goes back and punches the flatter delivery down to long-on
flighted delivery on off stump, Sanga defends it back to the bowler
bowls it with a grunt, but this one goes wide down the leg side..That brings up his century of wides in ODIs.
length delivery outside off, some shape on that one, the batsman tries to push it to off, but gets an inside edge towards mid-on
length delivery from wide of the crease, whipped to midwicket
bowls another one on the leg stump, Dilshan wanted to glance it fine, but he gets hit on the pad
length delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it on the up to long-off
he bowls a perfect delivery to a right-hander, except, it's Sanga on strike, it's another wide now
length delivery outside off, Sanga comes forward and pushes it to cover
the batsman gets beaten by an angled delivery as he takes a couple of steps down the pitch and tries to drive it through off
quicker delivery from round the wicket, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it to deep point
he takes a couple of steps down the pitch and punches it down to long-on
fires this one down the leg side, the batsman tries to pull it but gets hit on the pads. There is an appeal for lbw, but that would have hit the sixth stump down the leg side
he goes on the back foot and works the flatter delivery to deep backward square leg
full and straying down the leg side, it if clipped fine past the short-fine leg fielder
he stands talls and punches that one down to long-on for a single
takes a couple of steps and pushes the back of length delivery to long-on for a single
full delivery outside off, Dilshan plays a punchy drive, but straight back at the bowler
length ball just outside off, the batsman comes forward and nudges it to the left of extra cover fielder
length delivery on the stumps, easily clipped away to deep midwicket for a single
length delivery on off, solidly defended to the off side
and another accurate delivery on off stump, it is defended towards midwicket
tossed up delivery on off stump, Sanga pushes it back to the bowler
lower trajectory delivery on off, it is pushed to the left of the bowler
slower delivery just outside off, it is dabbed towards the gap at cover for a quick single
oh no, the square-leg umpire has been hit! Oh he is lucky, it hit his boot. It was a long-hop and was asking to be hit. Dilshan slapped it hard but the umpire wasn't able to get out of the way.
he comes forward and pushes the flighted delivery to midwicket
he comes down the pitch and pushes the quicker delivery to deep midwicket for a quick couple
here comes the Dilscoop, well not quite, but still a good ramp shot from outside off, down to fine-leg boundary
length delivery outside off, he goes for an on the up drive, but hits it straight to point
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and punches it to deep cover
another one down the leg side
length delivery on off, he comes forward and punches it back past the stumps at non-striker's end for a stylish single
length delivery outside off, Dilshan punches it to long-off for a single
he takes a couple of steps down the pitch and flicks the slower delivery to deep midwicket for a single
he skips down the track and punches the flatter delivery down to long-off
shorter and flatter on the stumps, the batsman goes back and pulls it to deep midwicket
slower and tossed up on off, Sanga goes back and pushes it to long-on
he stays on the crease and punches a flat delivery to mid-off, but the fielder throws it unnecessarily, gives away overthrows
takes two small steps down the crease and pushes it to midwicket for a single
pushed through outside off stump, Dilshan rocks back and slaps it through backward point
full and flighted outside off, driven straight to cover
he brings up his 11000 runs in ODIs, with a  slap past short fine leg off a quicker delivery
tossed up delivery on the stumps, dabs it to midwicket for a single
bowls a quicker delivery on the pads, it is worked away towards deep square leg
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to midwicket off the back foot
quicker one on off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, the batsman opens the face to run it towards point, they nick a single
quicker delivery on off stump, Dilshan goes back and punches it firmly to long-off
here comes the big shot, he comes down the track but instead of going straight, sweeps it over midwicket, bisects the two fielders in the deep
now he goes towards wide long-on, the fielder does well to cut it off
fired on the off stump, Dilshan cuts it but finds the fielder at point

slower one on off, the batsman defends it towards point, Sanga runs halfway down and has to scamper back as the fielder from point comes in, a direct hit comes in at the  non-striker's end, Sanga dives in and has made it in time..
moves outside the leg stump and clobbers the full and flighted delivery over extra cover..
pushed through on the stumps, it is nudged to the right of short fine leg fielder
full and flighted delivery on the middle stump, Dilshan comes down the pitch and pushes it to long-on
flatter delivery on off stump, it is pushed towards extra cover for a single
he goes back to a shorter delivery and cuts it, straight to point
comes down the pitch to a tossed up delivery and drives it straight to mid-off, but makes it to the non-striker's end by the time the throw comes in
short and wide, Dilshan cracks it off the back foot, but again, he hits it to the fielder at point, who is not able to stop it cleanly and the batsmen run a single
slower delivery, but this one is on the pads and Sanga just places it to the right of the short fine leg fielder, it bolts to the boundary
and another one on the pads, this time Sanga is unable to beat that fielder, but they take a single
bowls it wide outside off, the batsman throws his bat at it and gets beaten, but it is too wide
short delivery angling in, Dilshan places his pull shot behind square, that scoots to the boundary
slower delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long-off
no-ball (overstepped), wide-ball, take your pick ..
fuller length delivery wide outside off, the batsman goes down on his knee and hits it over the non-striker, he didn't get any timing on that though and it's just a single
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman gets an inside edge to short fine
comes down the pitch to a tossed up delivery, pushes it to midwicket
he defends it back to the bowler this time
fourth dot ball, defended to the bowler again
bowled with a pause, the batsman goes back and punches it to long-on
floated delivery on the pads, it is flicked to deep square leg for a single
floated delivery on off stump, it was the arm ball and cramped him for room as he went for cut
this one is slightly wide and Dilshan cuts it to deep point
floated outside off stump, it is driven to cover
tossed up delivery, Sanga almost takes out the umpire at the non-striker's end. That's the thing about him, he looked like he was just going to push it but he smashed it, really murdered that one

caught at midwicket!, this time it's a good low catch that does Sanga..He came down the track to a flighted delivery, and got too close to the pitch of the ball, he cracks it hard and low towards midwicket where Anamul completes a neat catch
he beats the batsman outside off with a quick arm-ball
flighted delivery on the pads, easily nudged towards deep square leg for a single

he fires it down the leg side, the batsman misses it and earns an extra, but Mushfiqur took the bails off and he has asked the umpire to take a look. The keeper waited for Perera to lift his foot and then takes the bails off. But did he raise his foot? Or did Mush took the bails off at the exact moment? too much doubt..That saves the batsman
pushed through on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
tossed up delivery on the stumps, he drives it straight to midwicket
quicker delivery on off, it is pushed down to long-off
flighted delivery on the pads, worked away to deep square leg with ease
tossed up delivery outside off, he resists the temptation to go big, drives it to long-off
quicker delivery just outside off, he comes forward and punches it hard to deep extra cover
another quicker one on off stump, he goes back and punches it to deep cover
fired in to the stumps, the batsman stays in the crease and pushes it firmly to long-on
tossed up and slower on off stump, the batsman drives it straight back to the bowler
this one is flatter and on the stumps, Dilshan goes on the back foot and punches it to deep extra cover

goes for the big shot but plays across the line to a slow delivery, the batsman misses it completely and loses his middle stump. He was aiming for the deep midwicket boundary but was completely beaten by the length and pace in that delivery
he stays in the crease and pushes the flatter delivery towards point for an easy single
he comes down the track to the flighted delivery, drives it down to long-on for a single
he goes deep into the crease to a flatter delivery, punches it to long-on
pushed through on the pads from round the wicket, dabbed towards square leg for a single
he dabs it towards cover point for another quick single
skips down the pitch and pushes the flighted delivery to midwicket
slow and wide outside off, Dilshan goes back and punches it to deep extra cover to bring up his 16th ODI hundred, his second this series, and his fourth on this ground
flighted down the leg side, the batsman misses and the umpire calls it a wide
bowled slow on the pads, the batsman misses his flick to the leg side
full and flighted on the stumps, Angelo comes down the track and pushes it to mid-on, just a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, Dilshan punches it straight to midwicket
slower delivery on off stump, the batsman manages to push it back to the bowler
floated up outside off, the batsman drives it to deep cover for a single
bowls it slightly short on the pads, it is slapped to deep square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on the middle and leg line, Angelo comes out of the crease and pushes it to long-on
stays on the back foot and works the flatter delivery to square leg with the turn
quicker delivery on the stumps, flicked to fine-leg for a single
stays on the back foot and punches it to deep midwicket
this one spins down the leg side, another wide
he walks across the stumps and nudges it to square leg for a single

another one for Razzak! Angelo has had enough, he comes down the pitch and tries to hoick it over long-on, but gets beaten in the flight completely. The ball drift in a bit and squeezes in through the gap between bat and pad, the keeper does the rest. Easily done
goes for a sweep and he misses, gets hit on the pads. The bowler asks the question, but that one pitched outside leg
now he beats the bat with an arm-ball that goes across the left-hander
now the batsman answers with a reverse sweep, doesn't hit it too well, but gets it fine on the off side anyway
tossed up delivery down the leg side, he goes for a swing but misses it
quicker delivery on off stump, it is defended towards point off the back foot
pushed through outside off, the batsman is hurried by that one and ends up pushing it to cover

another one goes down, beautifully bowled by Gazi! He flights it on off stump and the ball keeps coming with the angle from round the wicket, the batsman tries to defend it to the off side, but it sneaks between the gap between the bat and pad and hits the off stump
flighted delivery on the stumps, the batsman works it straight to square leg
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it to mid-on
pushed through on the stumps, it is flicked to midwicket now
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman plays it to midwicket with the turn
goes for the ramp shot and gets hit where it hurts the most..
overcomes the pain with another ramp shot past short  fine-leg
this one is a low full-toss, the batsman mows it too deep square leg where there is a fielder patrolling
and that break has earned Bangladesh another wicket, this time it is Chandimal who plays a loose shot without moving  his feet to a length ball outside off, he chops it on back to his stumps
length delivery outside off, the batsman guides it to point and they take  a quick single

just short of length delivery outside off, Dilshan clubs it to deep midwicket where Gazi makes a complete hash of it. To be fair though, it just bounces a couple of meters ahead of him, but he didn't put his body behind that one..The bowler was not impressed with that effort
bowls a good yorker on the leg stump, the batsman pushes it to midwicket for a single
slower delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and square-drives it to deep point
oh very close to the stumps that one as Thirimanne gets an inside edge at a full delivery, the keeper does the fielding
slower delivery on the pads, the batsman tries to clip it on the leg side, but gets hit on the pads
this is a knee-high full-toss on off stump, the batsman drags it to the on side, to deep midwicket for a single
is that a drop? It was a full delivery outside off and Thirimanne went for an inside-out aerial drive. It just dropped short of Nasir at cover
it is clobbered through extra cover off a wide delivery from Razzak, he is waging a lone battle at the moment
full delivery on off stump, he drives it down to long-off this time
floated outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover
short delivery on off stump, the batsman cuts it hard, but hits it straight to backward point
oh that one is a poor delivery, it's way down the leg side and it runs away to the boundary, no chance for the keeper
slower and tossed up on off, the batsman pushes it towards cover for a single
pushed through on off stump, it is driven back to the bowler
he moves outside the leg stump and whacks the length delivery over the umpire's head for another boundary..

caught at midwicket! he bowls a length delivery, slightly slower, on the middle stump line. Dilshan flogs him towards midwicket, or so it seems, but Nasir was at the edge of the circle and times his jump to catch a very-hard hit shot. Excellent innings by Dilshan comes to an end
length delivery just outside off, it is pushed to cover off the back foot
full delivery on the off stump, Kula slaps it hard, but finds the man at deep mid-on
short of length delivery wide outside off, the batsman tries to pull it to the leg side, but just manages pushing it to midwicket as he gets hurried by the delivery
short delivery by the bowler, Kula ducks under it
flighted delivery on the stumps, very slow, Thirimanne moves outside the leg stump and chops it past point for a couple
he makes room again at a full and flighted delivery, tries to go over extra cover, but gets an inside edge to short fine

he comes down the pitch and tries to turn it to leg side, but gets a leading edge towards extra cover. Nasir hits the stumps at non-striker's end and they run an overthrow of the ricochet. Kula was well in there..
he gives himself some room and tries to go over extra cover, gets beaten
pushed wide outside off, the batsman gets beaten, but that's too wide
walks down the pitch and drags a flighted delivery to deep backward square leg
this time he gets under it in style, it was flighted and Kula gets a lot of bat on it, it is lifted over the bowler's head for a straight six, the second of the innings
now Thirimanne joins in the fun, he makes room by moving outside leg and flogs a length delivery over the  long-off boundary for another six
beautifully steered over short-third man. It was a shortish delivery that followed the batsman, there wasn't much room, but he arched back and steered it over the fielder
slower delivery on the leg stump, it is too short for that pace and the batsman slaps it to deep midwicket. Anamul does well to save a certain boundary
bowls a good yorker outside off and Thiri gets beaten as he makes room
another very full delivery outside off, the batsman aims to hit it straight down the ground, but gets an inside edge to his pads. They scamper for a single
full delivery outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and smacks it along the ground, but straight to extra cover
bowls the arm ball which Kula tries to work to the leg side, he plays across the line and gets hit right in front. An easy decision for the umpire. Wicket no. 199 for Razzak
and he strikes straightaway, that is wicket no. 200 and that is is five-for too. This was full and quick on the leg stump, the batsman plays a hoick across the line and loses his leg stump

another shout for lbw as the ball thuds into the pads, but it was probably sliding down leg side. Malinga leaves his crease, but he is sent back. In the meantime, Nasir gets to the ball at point and flicks a low return to the keeper. They are checking for the run out and the batsman gets back with his bat still in the air. Did he get back in time? Yes, says the third umpire
now he charges down the track and swings the length ball over midwicket, couple of bounces and four
short delivery and fired in, the batsman slaps it to long-on for a single

he doesn't get four, he gets six! It was a length ball and quick too, the batsman takes two small steps and cracks it high and handsome over the midwicket boundary, smashes all the binoculars and microscopes..

inn2.comm: length delivery angles in and then straightens a touch, beats the bat
brings it into the right-hander from back of length, the batsman tries to flick it to the leg side but gets hit around mid-riff..
this one swings in too much and is down the leg side, it clips the pads and goes fine to the boundary
another one which cuts into the pads from outside off, the batsman is unable to get any bat on that
back of length delivery, comes in from outside off, Ash defends it solidly to the off side
he walks across the stumps and tries to flick an inswinging delivery towards the leg side, but he gets hit on the pads. The bowler asks question, but that was probably doing too much
full delivery on the pads, 138 kph, he gets behind the line and dabs it towards midwicket for a single
length delivery, shaping away from the batsman who comes forward and defends it to off
length delivery on the pads, another leg-bye as this one rolls towards square leg
this one swings away, just outside off. The batsman keeps his bat away from the line of the ball
super delivery! It pitches around off stump on a length and then leaves the batsman, who is completely squared up in his defence and gets beaten
another one like that, but this time the batsman gets some bat to it, defended towards point
he comes forward and drives the incoming delivery back down the ground, the mid-off fielder cuts it off
oh this is bad! this one swings too much and beats Sanga by a big margin.
length delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman flicks it with the swing down to deep backward square leg
short and wide outside off, this one doesn't do anything in the air and Anamul cashes in by thrashing it through cover point
fuller delivery outside off, no movement again, the batsman plays a square drive without any feet movement
bowls length delivery that swings in big time again, the  batsman waits on the back foot and whips it to deep square leg
that was a bad shot! It was length delivery wide outside off and the batman throws his bat at that without any feet movement at all, he gets beaten
length delivery going away from the batsman, Ash comes forward and solidly defends it to the off side
back of length delivery outside off, goes further away, Ash shows patience and lets it go through
stays on the back foot to a length delivery on off and gets an outside edge to third-man as he gets squared up in his defence
short delivery, surprises the batsman, but he does well to get out of the way just in time
that's a real good one! It was a short delivery on off stump, the batsman is late to sway away from the line
he goes for the slower delivery on off stump, and Anamul gets sucked into playing an uppish drive. Luckily for him, it just goes over the mid-off fielder and on its way to the boundary
bowls a wide length delivery outside off, it swings further away, the batsman chases it and pushes it to cover without any timing
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and guides it to third-man
he waits on the back foot and defends the length delivery to the off side
the batsman stays on the backfoot to a fuller delivery outside off, he gets an outside edge past first-slip that runs down to the third-man boundary
this time he comes forward and opens the face to run down the length delivery to third man
oh that is cracked away with some timing! It was a fuller delivery outside off and Ash leans on to it, opens the face a touch and creams it through point
back of length delivery just outside off, Anamul stays on the back foot and defends it towards off
good short delivery on off stump, this time he stays right behind it and fends it back down the pitch
another short one, but this one is wide and the batsman cuts it hard, but Dilshan puts his body behind it and stops a certain boundary
another short and sharp delivery outside off, he gets up on his toes and guides it to third-man
he goes for another short one, but this one goes down the leg side
more short stuff by Malinga, this one pitches around off stump and goes further away, the batsman ducks under it
super shot! This is a length delivery wide outside off and Ash is quick to get into front foot, he caresses it through cover
length delivery on off stump, the batsman walks across the stumps and pushes it to mid-on
length delivery outside off, goes further away, left alone by the batsman
angles it into the stumps, the batsman stays solidly behind it and defends
oh super shot and super stop! It was a length delivery and Ash cuts it with some power, Dilshan makes an equally impressive save
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it solidly
oh gorgeous! this one is marginally fuller outside off and it's like he was waiting for it, he pounces on it and slaps it through covers
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman stands tall and chops it towards deep backward point for a quick couple. It's the 50 of the partnership
bowls a low full-toss on the pads which the batsman flicks to deep backward square leg for another couple
goes back to the short stuff, the batsman ducks under it
slower delivery bowled on a length on off stump, the batsman dabs it towards midwicket and pinches a single
length delivery going away from the batsman, Ash stays on the back foot and steers it to third man
fuller length delivery that draws the batsman forward and then beats the bat
tossed up delivery on off, defended towards midwicket
pushed through on the leg stump  line, the batsman nudges it to deep square leg for a single
full delivery on the middle and leg line, flicked away to deep square leg
bowls a flatter ,shorter delivery outside off, the batsman goes for a cut but is beaten by the bounce
fuller delivery on the pads, defended to midwicket
slower and flighted on off stump, the batsman comes forward in defence
full delivery outside off, it leaves the batsman and beats him as he pokes at that one
bowls a quick full delivery on the pads, the batsman goes off balance as he digs it out towards midwicket
loud appeal for lbw as the batsman gets hit on the pads in his attempt to flick it, he misses out as that was a loose one down the leg side
stays in the crease and crunches an on the up drive to a wide delivery outside off, straight to mid-off
oh super shot! It was full on off and middle and he flicks it some wristy flourish through midwicket
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to mid-off
quicker delivery on the off and middle line, defended off the back foot
he walks across the stumps and whips the length delivery to deep square leg
flatter delivery outside off, defended off the back foot
beats the outside edge with a quicker delivery outside off, Ash misses his cut shot
bowls a flatter delivery on the pads and Ash dabs it towards square leg, calls for a quick couple
this time he times his cut perfectly, it beats the two men around point and runs through to the boundary
loose shot by the batsman as he throws his bat at a wide delivery, gets beaten
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and solidly defends it to off
full delivery outside off, Anamul stays rooted to the crease but drives it deep cover
length delivery outside off, the batsman goes for an on the up drive, but hits it straight to the stumps on the other side
oh another super shot! It was just marginally short of length outside off, the batsman rocks back and whacks it to deep midwicket boundary
length ball outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly
flatter delivery outside off, the batsman dabs it towards cover and calls for a quick single
he waits on the back foot and dabs it towards cover for another quick single
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to off side
flighted just outside off, more front foot defence

he has got the batsman with a quicker one. Ash went to the back foot when he should have been forward. The ball pitches around off stump and just turns in to beat the bat and hits Ash right in front. But was there an inside edge? It looks like it from the front-angle, but not very easy to tell. Ash certainly thinks so. But it looked plumb to the naked eye
he takes a huge forward stride and solidly defends the length ball back to the bowler
bowls short of length delivery on off stump, defended off the back foot
length delivery outside off, this one goes away and beats the bat
he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to cover
another length delivery outside off is firmly pushed to cover
back of length outside off, he cuts it to deep backward point for a couple
edged, but there is no slip and it runs down the boundary. It's amazing that the outfield is still quick. The batsman tries to push the back of length delivery to off, gets a healthy edge
back of length delivery on off, it is steered down to third-man
back of length  but with some width, the batsman thumps it off the backfoot through point, no stopping that one.

length delivery is punched back straight to the bowler, but Jahurul loses his mind, starts running and is too late to turn. Thisara misses the direct hit as Jahurul tries to get back and he is safe. But they are checking for obstructing the field. But it should be safe. However, What was he doing!! He is safe.
this one cuts back into the batsman and beats everyone - the batsman, the keeper  - and runs down to the fine-leg boundary
back of length delivery on the stumps, comes back into the batsman who misses his pull shot and gets hit on the body, the batsmen steal a single
this one seams away from short of length and beats the bat as the batsman tries to steer it to third man
he makes room and drives the length ball powerfully past the non-striker, the long-on fielder keeps them to single with a quick pick-up and throw
now he charges out of the crease and slices the length delivery over point! It lands in no-man's land. However, this is a bit unnecessary risk-taking

caught by cover! Why why why! He again charges out and tries to go inside out over extra cover but ends up hitting it high in the air. Three fielder on the off side converge - two from cover and one from the deep, but it's the fielder from cover who was running outwards who takes an excellent catch with the ball coming from behind him
now Jahurul comes down the pitch and tries to swing the length ball to the leg side, the ball takes an inside edge, hits his body and rolls to the off side

length delivery wide outside off, Mush chops it towards point and they hesitate as they call for a single. Dilshan at point takes the stumps down with a direct hit, but Jahurul has made it in. Third umpire says not out
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to deep cover
back of length delivery on off, it's punched down the ground for a single
this one cuts back into Mush from short of length and cramps him for room as he tries to cut it. The ball takes an inside edge and goes to the keeper after bouncing close to the stumps
another wild slog! This one goes past the off stump.. Manic!!
another wild slog, but this time he makes a connection and sends the length delivery to deep backward square leg..
another slog off a length ball on the middle, this time he hits it in front of square on the leg side, Jeevan Mendis sends the ball back in a  hurry
short and wide, the batsman crunches it hard off the back foot, but straight to deep cover
he charges down to a length ball and a thick outside edge flies high to third-man, Thisara makes a good effort but the ball drops before him and goes to the boundary
back of length delivery on the stumps, he whips it off his hips past short fine. Malinga runs after it and keeps them to two
length delivery on the stumps, he pulls it in the air (across the line again), to deep square leg
length delivery outside off, better stuff from the batsman as he guides it to third-man
another back of length delivery, he clips it in the air, not very far from Malinga at short-fine, it beats the fielder and runs to the boundary

gone! caught behind! Some sense needed here! He has already had a good over and he charges out to play what?? It was a back of length delivery wide outside off, Jahurul tries to punch it through off, gets a big outside edge straight into the hands off the keeper
dabbed to the leg side and they call for another single, it wasn't very far and the bowler got to it quickly
quicker delivery outside off, the batsman is beaten in his cut
full and flighted, it's driven towards long-on, but the bowler dives to his right and stops that
bowls a quicker one down the leg side, called a wide
quicker one outside off, it's short too, Nasir cracks it to deep cover off the back foot
tossed up delivery, driven back to the bowler
slides it past the outside edge as the batsman comes forward to defend
back of length delivery on the stumps, dabbed towards cover and they take a single

gone! madness! Stupidity! Suicide! The batsman drops the ball right in front towards the bowler and they call for a single. It's in the hands of the bowler when Mush is parallel to him trying to get to the other end. He could have taken an aim for 10 seconds and done the job, but Thisara hits it in one go. Gone by miles
length delivery on off, the batsman now plays a classical off drive to deep extra cover
short and wide outside off, the batsman cuts it without any feet movement, the batsman gets an inside edge and Sanga does well to dive to his left to stop that
he almost chops it back to his stumps as he tries to push a length delivery away from his body, it hits his pads and goes towards point
back of length delivery on off, dabbed to the gap at cover for an easy single.. What's the problem with playing this this. Perfectly easy way to take a run.
length delivery outside off, the batsman waits for it and plays an excellent shot past backward point for a beautifully timed boundary
full delivery on the pads, the batsman misses his flick but then it runs down to the fine-leg boundary off his pads
cuts back into the batsman from short of length, it hits the thigh pad and they take a quick single
back of length delivery on off, easily dabbed towards cover point and a single is taken
almost a run out! Nasir had given up and it was Dilshan v the stumps. He dabbed it to Dilshan and took off and was left stranded in the middle, Dilshan misses and they take a single
short of length ball on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
full and flighted on off, driven straight to cover
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman dabs it to the left of cover and calls for a quick single
flatter delivery on the middle stumps, the batsman dabs it to Dilshan at midwicket and they call for a single. Another direct hit, and the ricochet gives them an extra
goes! Reverse sweep! Why Mahmudullah Why! It was a straight delivery, pitches in line, hits him in line as the batsman misses his super cute shot!
quicker delivery on off, it takes the inside edge to the leg side as the batsman comes forward to defend
comes down the track to a full and flighted delivery and drives it to long-off for a single

back of length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to the off side where Angelo makes a diving save and throws the ball to the non-striker's, the batsman just makes it inside the crease in time.. Not out says the third umpire

gone! No what was that! This was a super delivery outside off, it was short of length and it straightens and squares the batsman up, big noise, but that was thigh pad probably, Sanga takes it and tosses it up in the air, the umpire says no and they take a single
full delivery on the pads, driven beautifully to deep midwicket for a couple
back of length delivery on middle, he hits it to mid-on off the shoulder off the bat and they take a risky run again. Had Kula hit the stumps, this one would have been interesting too
back of length delivery on the body, the batsman slaps it to deep midwicket without any timing
charges down the track and whacks the length delivery over midwicket for a much-needed boundary, not for anyone else, but just to calm their nerves
he comes out of the track and takes the ball on the full, but drives it straight back to the bowler
moves outside leg and chips the full delivery over the bowler's head for  a single
charges down the pitch and drives the full delivery down to long-off for a single
bowls a low full toss on leg stump, Nasir doesn't get the placement right with his sweep, hits it to deep backward square
he comes out to a quicker one and gets an inside edge to backward square leg
he moves outside leg, the bowler follows him, it is driven to cover
short delivery, the batsman has moved outside the leg stump and the ball is wide outside off, he stretches for it and gets an outside edge to the third-man boundary
this one is way down the leg side, Sanga does well to stop that from going to the boundary
short of length delivery, gets up chest high, the batsman does well to defend it back down the pitch
another short delivery, this time Nasir pulls it right in front of his face, to Mendis at deep square leg

gone! it was a brute of a delivery, short of length keeps rising on the batsman and just moves a touch away too, the batsman tries to fend it off but gets a faint edge to the keeper, the fielder erupt.
another super delivery, a short one right over the stumps, the batsman gets out of the line right at the end

caught at extra cover! The procession continues. It was bowled quick on short of length right over the stumps, Zia moved outside leg stump and tries to slap it over extra cover, but the ball comes too quickly to him and he ends up giving a tame catch which the fielder takes diving forward
bowls a length delivery wide outside off, Nasir murders it through extra cover, beats the man at sweeper
short of length deilvery, wide, wider, called a wide
length delivery  on off stump, he gives it one proper golf swing, he hasn't timed it too well, but it's in the gap at cow corner and it trickles to the boundary
tries to play a cute upper cut off a short of length delivery, gets beaten by the bounce
short of length on the stump, he moves outside leg and slaps it to that gap at cow corner again, one bounce and four..

oh my god, he cuts this short of length delivery straight to third-man, where Kula takes  a catch jumping towards the boundary, he realises he is going out of the playing area, so he lobs it back, tries to get back to catch it, but it's too far. Umpires checking if Kula has touched the rope, but i think it's a great effort. But a bit too late
short of length delivery on off, the batsman tries to play a tennis forehand, gets a top edge over the keeper's head
